author: redditsanchez
body:
Here is the list 1-50. Keep in mind this was put together a few day(s) week(s) ago? Some of these may be much riskier than before. Alibaba for example, though the entry point is cheaper than when they wrote the article.  Also, from the article:

&#x200B;

*We used our proprietary methodology to identify the 50 global companies best positioned to deliver above-average gains to investors. They are ranked by overall "vitality" score.*
